    • setTable

      public void setTable​(javax.swing.JTable table)
      Receives from the database an arraylist of objects and sets up a table. It generates the header of the table by extracting through reflection the object properties and then populates the table with the values of the elements from the list.
      Parameters:
      table - - the table to be set up
